ejb-jar.description: This ejb-jar file contains assembled enterprise beans that are part of employee self-service application.

entity.description: The EmployeeRecord entity bean encapsulates access to the employee records.The deployer will use container-managed persistence to integrate the entity bean with the back-end system managing the employee records.

resource-ref.description: This is a reference to a JDBC database.

entity.description: Same as BasicCmpBean; however primary key is not auto-generated.

resource-ref.description: This is a reference to a JDBC database.

entity.description: The EmployeeRecord entity bean encapsulates access to the employee records.The deployer will use container-managed persistence to integrate the entity bean with the back-end system managing the employee records.

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM BasicCmp2 AS o WHERE o.lastName = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM BasicCmp2 AS o WHERE 1 = 0

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AOBasicCmp2 AS o WHERE o.lastName = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM AOBasicCmp2 AS o WHERE 1 = 0

session.description: A basic stateful session bean with contianer-managed transaction demarcation that implements the javax.ejb.SessionSynchronization interface.
